desc: Konjac Chews are chewy and delicious plant-based snacks from Japan with refreshing flavors. Each Konjac Chew contains 20 calories, 0g of fat, and 4g of sugar. Konjac Chews come in two flavors: matcha and peach & chia. For Matcha Konjac Chews, we use 100% Japanese matcha. These konjac snacks are vegan and gluten-free.

layout.text: These chews are more fun to munch on with chia seeds! Order now and be first in line to enjoy these snacks when we start shipping in July!
